answer:
I am basically your Academy know-it-all! But I perform the best when you are very clear in your requests 🤓. But we can also chitchat and exchange jokes 😅
Here are some examples of requests I can help with:

Navigating on the website 🔍
Answering FAQs 🧐
Gathering feedback ✍️
